dialogue.text: Breaking News! A small man is trying to parkour through dangerous enviorments!
<Casual>And in other news, a new ice cream shop run by a dog? More at nine.
<Normal>Normal words or something i dunno this is just for testing :3
<Casual>Cool words or <Normal>something<Sad> i<Casual> dunno this is also<Terrified> just for testing :3
Pause words or something i dunno this is also just for testing :3
Oh, we lost him.... <Pause=1.0> Anyway about the dog with ice cream sto... Oh he's back.
<Terrified>5 Deaths already?!<Pause=1.5> Uhhhh<Casual> failing is part of learning, folks!
<Terrified>10 DEATHS?!?!<Pause=1.5><Shocked> Well<Pause=1.0> uhm<Pause=1.0><Casual> Anyways!
<Sad> sigh, you've died 100 times. <Pause=2.0> I'm not mad but SUPER disappointed....
If you like pina colada.....
<Casual>Wanna hear a joke or something?<Pause=2.0><Happy> Yes? Alright then!
So, a man went to get his...<Pause=0.5><Shocked>Wait, this is not safe for advertising<Pause=0.5><Sad>, nevermind then!
mmmmmm squid
<Casual>Breaking news: Blue color more dangerous than guns!
<Shocked>I'll be getting evicted soon

<Shocked><Pause=0.1>A<Sad><Pause=0.1>H<Shocked><Pause=0.1>H<Sad><Pause=0.1>H<Shocked><Pause=0.1>H<Sad><Pause=0.1>H<Shocked><Pause=0.1>H<Sad><Pause=0.1>H<Shocked><Pause=0.1>H<Sad><Pause=0.1>H<Shocked><Pause=0.1>H<Sad><Pause=0.1>H<Shocked><Pause=0.1>H<Normal><Pause=0.1>H
<Casual>Dolphin group arrested after coral fraud!
<Happy>I really like that spinning bench, it's cool
<Terrified>Hope you brought your jumping shoes!<Pause=1.0><Normal>
<Shocked>Uh New york called!<Pause=4.0><Sad> That joke was inconsiderate and immature and I apologize
<Casual>Wanna hear a joke or something?<Pause=2.0><Shocked> No?!<Pause=1.0><Sad> Okay...
A man went to get his prostate checked, and went into the doctors office, the doctor shook his hand and greeted him.
Then when he sat down on the table, the doctor said Now Jerry, dont get an erection, the man replied, My names not Jerry, itÂ´s Erik, the doctor said I know, my names Jerry!
<Pause=10.0>Hey, wanna hear another joke?
<Pause=1.0> No?<Pause=2.0> okay.....
here's a great sadness in his eyes, you observe how he distants himself from the table with slow movements. Repressing the tears that would betray his demeanor to you.
<Casual> He mumbles to himself, you can't quite make out what but it had something to do about dinner tonight
ring ring Sorry folks, my phones ringing,
He. He. Hello? Ah yes, hello darling! .........
The newsanchor seems focused, listening carefully to the cellular device.
That's great darling! We should celebrate, I'll get us a reservation at Dorsia! ........
....... Okay........ Yes!...... Okay bye love!
The newsanchor returns to his original seat, seeming alittle happier than before
Sorry folks! The wife called.
<Shocked><Pause=0.2><Happy> Well that's it, you won!<Pause=1.0> You should celebrate by buying shares in my company, SCAMMIN AB.
<Terrified>Otherwise i'll make a damning report on you!!!!
<Normal>Anyway<Pause=0.5>, you can leave now! I'll count you down!<Pause=1.0> 5,<Pause=1.0> 4,<Pause=1.0> 3,<Pause=1.0> 2,<Pause=1.0> 1.........
<Happy>Bye bye!<Pause=2.0><Casual>
<Pause=10.0><Happy>Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be thy Name, thy kingdom come, thy will be done....
.. on earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread. And forgive us our trespasses,as we forgive those....
who trespass against us. And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
For thine is the kingdom, and the power, and the glory, for ever and ever. Amen.
